call_title: Ergo POW Blockchain Weekly Update & AMA - July 25th 2024

decisions.decision: Sigmanauts Mining Pool will become the first mining pool to collect storage rent
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: After setting up testnet infrastructure and binding mining core
decisions.quote: we will hot beef injection that into the actual Mining Core on the Sigmanauts Mining Pool and become the first mining pool, hopefully, that collects storage rent

decisions.decision: Sigmanauts will put in a proposal to fund mgPai for Keystone wallet integration
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: mgPai is working on time estimates for the integration work
decisions.quote: I'd like to put a proposal forward for the Sigmanauts to help fund mgPai in his efforts to do that

commitments.commitment: qx() will start injecting storage rent into Mining Core app on testnet
commitments.quote: qx() is going to start injecting his storage rent into the Mining Core app

commitments.commitment: Mr. Pixel will buff up a cyber citizen for RareEvo demo
commitments.quote: he's going to buff up a cyber citizen for us and we're going to have that at the table at RareEvo

commitments.commitment: Mr. Pixel is working towards a video reveal for a dev update
commitments.quote: Mr. Pixel has promised that he's working towards a video reveal for a dev update at some point

commitments.commitment: Cornell blockchain workshops and hackathon will be organized
commitments.quote: let's start chatting about Ergo sponsoring workshops for the Cornell blockchain group

commitments.commitment: Meeting with Switch Here fiat onramp provider scheduled
commitments.quote: that meeting's Monday at I think like 8 or 8 a.m. my time

open_questions.question: Whether Kraz is working on documentation beyond DuckPools
open_questions.context: Discussion about lack of Ergo documentation for developers

open_questions.question: When exchange partner will guarantee on and off ramp capability
open_questions.context: Exchange negotiations have been ongoing for weeks without firm timeline

open_questions.question: Whether Rosen token can be included as a freebie in fiat onramp integration
open_questions.context: Trying to get both ERG and Rosen token available for direct fiat purchase

key_facts.fact: Cloud service costs $13/month for 8 cores and 8 gigabytes of RAM
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts has about 11,000 ERG left in treasury
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: EF monthly grants capped at $10,000 per month on marketing side
key_facts.speaker: CannonQ

key_facts.fact: Cyberverse had 66 participants in poker night event
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Trajectory has almost 400k total value locked
key_facts.speaker: CannonQ

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool gives out 15-16 bonus token injections per day
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts spends 100 ERG per month from treasury on ecosystem tokens
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Switch Here fiat onramp will expand to US in 6-8 months
key_facts.speaker: qx()
